entry.title: Terra Founder Faces Government Investigations, Lawsuits, and $78M Fine for Tax Evasion
entry.summary: South Korean authorities have formed an emergency financial crimes unit to investigate the collapse of stablecoin protocol Terra, and fined the protocol’s founder, Do Kwon, $78M for tax evasion, local media reported.
